Various ot___ written sty___ are al__ used i_ Chinese calli______, incl_____ seal scr___, cur____ script a__ clerical scr___. data.fullContent: Modern characters are styled after the regular script. Various other written styles are also used in Chinese calligraphy, including seal script, cursive script and clerical script. Calligraphy artists can write in traditional and simplified characters, but they tend to use traditional characters for traditional art.
data.answer: 现代汉字都是按楷书写成的。中国书法还采用了其他各种书写风格，包括篆书、草书和隶书。书法艺术家可以用繁体字和简体字书写，但他们更倾向于用繁体字来创作传统艺术。
